apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this woman with medium skin tone and blond hair is rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading that gives her a friendly, approachable appearance. Her flowing blond hair catches the light with smooth gradients, creating a sense of natural movement and volume. This emoji is a versatile representation of women with this distinct look, often used to signify personal identity or to add a specific visual element to conversations on Apple devices.
